column2: "Nna ɔyarfo bi wɔ hɔ a wɔfrɛ no Lazarus a ofi Bɛtani
column3: Mary nye no nuabaa Martha hɔn kurow mu."

column2: "Mary a ɔdze ngohuam seraa Ewuradze na ɔdze ne tsinhwi pepaa n’anan ho no na no nuabanyin Lazarus yaree no."
"Dɛm ntsi ne nkyerɛbaa no somae baa Jesus hɔ bɛsee no dɛ

column5: ama wɔnam do aahyɛ Nyankopɔn Ba no enyimnyam."

column2: "Nna Jesus dɔ Martha nye no nuabaa nye Lazarus
column4: "naaso ber a ɔtsee dɛ ɔyar no ɔtsenaa mbrɛ ɔwɔ no ara ndaenu."
ɔnnkyɛree biara na Jewfo no hwehwɛɛ wo dɛ wobesiw wo abo

column3: Ana nnyɛ ndɔnhwer duebien na ɔwɔ adzekyee mu? Sɛ obi nam ewia a
column5: osiandɛ ohu wiadze yi kan no."

column3: ɔkaa no wɔ no wu ho
column5: wosusuu dɛ eregye w’ahom wɔ nda mu ho asɛm na ɔreka."

column2: "Nna Jesus kaa kyerɛɛ hɔn pefee dɛ
"na ɔyɛ me dɛw wɔ hom ntsi dɛ minnyi hɔ
column3: ama hom aagye edzi: naaso hom mma yɛnkɔ ne nkyɛn."

column2: "Na Tomas a wɔfrɛ no Ata no see ne mfɛfo esuafo no dɛ
column3: Hom mma hɛn so yɛnye no nkɔ na yɛnye no eewu."

column2: "Na Jesus bae no obohun dɛ Lazarus edzi ndaanan wɔ nda no mu dada."
"Eso nna Bɛtani bɛn Jerusalɛm ho bɛyɛ akwansin ebien."
"Nna Jewfo pii aba Martha nye Mary nkyɛn dɛ wɔrebɛma hɔn hyɛ dzen wɔ hɔn nua no ntsi."

column3: ɔkɔree kehyiaa no; na Mary dze
column4: ɔkɔr do araa tsenaa fie hɔ."

column3: minyim dɛ biribiara a ibebisa Nyankopɔn no
Minyim dɛ da a odzi ekyir wunyan no mu
Emi nye wunyan no nye nkwa no: nyia ɔgye me dzi no
column7: "na obiara a ɔtse ase na ɔgye me dzi no
column8: onnkowu da. Ana egye iyi dzi?"

column5: magye edzi dɛ ɔwo nye Kraest no
column6: Nyankopɔn Ba no a ɔreba wiadze no."

column3: osii mu kɔree kɛfrɛɛ no nuabaa Mary nsumaa mu dɛ
ɔsoɛɛr ntsɛmara na ɔbaa ne nkyɛn."

column2: "Nna Jesus nnyae mmbaa kurow no mu
column3: na ɔwɔ mbrɛ Martha kehyiaa no hɔ no."

column2: "Na Jewfo a wɔnye no wɔ fie rekyekye no werɛ no hun Mary dɛ ɔasoɛr ntsɛm epue no
column4: nna wosusu dɛ ɔrokɔ nda no do ekosu wɔ hɔ."

column2: "Na Jesus hun dɛ orusu na Jewfo a wɔnye no bae no so rusu no
column3: osii nkrum wɔ no sunsum mu na ɔyɛɛ no awerɛhow
column6: Hom dze no ato hen?  Wɔsee no dɛ

column3: Oyi a obuee onyifuranyi no enyiwa no
column4: oenntum amma dɛ nkyɛ oyi so orunnwu anaa?"

column2: "Na Jesus sii nkrum wɔ no mu bio
column3: na ɔbaa nda no do: ɔbodan a
Hom nyi ɔbo no.  Nyia owui no nuabaa Martha see no dɛ

column2: "Na woyii ɔbo no. Na Jesus maa n’enyiwa do na ɔsee dɛ
column4: meda wo ase dɛ itsie me:"

column3: minyim dada dɛ itsie me daa
column4: na nyimpadodow a wogyinagyina ho yi ntsi na mesee dɛm
column5: ama wɔaagye edzi dɛ ɔwo na esomaa me."

column3: ɔdze ndze kɛse tseaa mu dɛ

column2: "Nyia owui no puei bae: nna nda mu atam kyekyer ne nan nye ne nsa
column3: na duukuu kyekyer n’enyim: na Jesus see hɔn dɛ

column2: "Na Jewfo no mu pii a wɔbaa Mary nkyɛn na wohun dza Jesus yɛe no
"na hɔn mu binom sii mu kɔr Farisiifo nkyɛn kɛkaa dza Jesus yɛe no kyerɛɛ hɔn."
"Na asɔfompanyin nye kyerɛwfo no maa wokehyiaa baguafo no
column5: na nyimpa yi reyɛ nsɛnkyerɛdze pii yi?"

column4: na Romefo afa hɛn bea nye hɛn man yi."

column3: Kaiafas a odzi afe noara mu sɔfopanyin
column7: "na eso hom nndwen dɛ oye ma hɛn dɛ nyimpa kor bowu ama ɔman no
column8: na ɔman no nyina aannhyew a."

column4: na odzi afe noara mu sɔfopanyin ntsi
column5: ɔhyɛɛ nkɔm dɛ Jesus rubowu ama ɔman no
column8: na dɛ ɔrebɛka Nyankopɔn mba a wɔapetse nyina so abɔ mu ayɛ kor."

column2: "Na ofitsi da no ara wɔfaa apam dɛ woboku no."
"Dɛm ntsi Jesus annantsew petee wɔ Jewfo no mu bio; na ofii hɔ kɔr asaase a ɔbɛn sar no ho no do
column3: wɔ kurow a wɔfrɛ no Efraim mu
na dodowara fiir asaase no do kɔr Jerusalɛm ansaana apaho no edu dɛ worukoguar hɔnho."
na wogyinaa asɔrfi no mu sesee hɔnho dɛ
